about.title: About me
about.primary: Hi, I'm Ashley, a Computer Science and Pure Math student at the University of Waterloo. Prev @Faire.
about.secondary: I am currently in search of internship opportunities for Fall 2023. My passion lies in Backend, Fullstack, Frontend, and infrastructure development, but I am also open to exploring other exciting opportunities. Feel free to reach out to meâ€”I would love to connect and discuss further possibilities!

projects.title: Space Invaders
projects.description: Developed a visually engaging version of Space Invaders using Kotlin and JavaFX, following the MVC pattern.

projects.title: Discord Bot
projects.description: Developed a JavaScript-based Discord Bot using RESTful APIs to play music from URLs and generate summary notifications in Discord based on Notion Database conditions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
